seaside-retreat.name: Seaside Retreat
seaside-retreat.description: A serene and elegant template inspired by coastal living, featuring a beautiful seaside backdrop with soft, natural colors.

gold-shine.name: Gold Shine
gold-shine.description: An elegant, museum-inspired template featuring a curated exhibit style with sophisticated typography and gold accents.

minima.name: Minima
minima.description: A clean, minimalist template with a modern design focusing on simplicity and readability.

batcave.name: Batcave
batcave.description: A sleek, dark-themed template inspired by developers and the night. Perfect for showcasing code, projects, and social links.
